      • sendMail

        public static void sendMail(java.lang.String body,
                            java.lang.String to,
                            java.lang.String from,
                            java.lang.String subject,
                            java.lang.Boolean html)
                     throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Send mail using Liferay's MailServiceUtil. Before calling this, check that Liferay is configured properly.
        Parameters:
        body - body of the message
        to - recipient, (if multiple, use comma to separate: example1@domain.fi, example2@domain.com )
        from - from
        subject - subject
        html - if body contains html
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - @see AddressException
